title: Need help with new Client.
body:
So today I decided to return to League of legends. I downloaded the installer, but I realised I have lol already installed, I opened it and it started patching my League of legends. Now it seems that it's done patching and I can't get the new client. This is what I see : 
http://imgur.com/sJitEPH 
And after I click the launch : 
http://imgur.com/4MEr5qN

replies.body:
Merbstrom's idea is a good one; what it looks like you're doing to me is using the old client app. The new one should be at the file location Merbstrom gave, and the icon should be the new client logo you're seeing in those pop ups. :)

Get back to me if you can't get into the new client that way. Maybe there's something else I can try! ^^
Try opening the new client directly maybe? It should be under C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe
